about_the_game:
Welcome to the one and only Heptic Arena. The only show worth watching!

Become a contender in the illustrious Arena and participate in the only blood sport televised across the known universe. Each episode will pit you and your friends not only against other contenders, but the whims of the organizers as well. Explore, upgrade your arsenal, shoot opponents, shoot your friends – do whatever it takes to become the champion of Heptic Arena!

A CLASH OF WORLDS

Built to mimic the home environments of the contenders, The Arena features four unique biomes – each with its own boons, challenges and hyper-aggressive fauna. Team up or brave the wilds alone, but know there are scarier things than players hiding in The Arena.

CHOOSE YOUR PATH

Select one of the many galactic species participating in the Arena, each allowing for a different approach to combat with their unique skill sets. Shape your characters your way with branching skill trees, active skills and unique passive bonuses to keep your enemies guessing.

MOVE IT OR LOSE IT

Zoom around the battlefield using a momentum-based movement system, opening up new opportunities and pathways around both the map and your foes. Learn the ropes, discover pathways and show your mastery of the Arena.

KILL OR BE KILLED

Kill and steal your way into the hearts of millions. Each kill earns favor with the audience that can be spent to purchase new weapons, upgrades and other goodies tailored to help you do what you do best – sow chaos.

Add Heptic Arena to your wishlist today!

Dive into early access on Steam and be part of the next big thing in competitive team shooters. The Arena beckons — will you answer the call?
